nodes.text: Desh was a male Imperial Governor who controlled Gandrossi VI, located in the Perinn sector in the Outer Rim Territories during the Galactic Civil War.

After losing a large sum of credits in a game of sakresh to the Devaronian merchant Ulicx Vinaq, Desh issued a warrant for the Devaronian's arrest, claiming that the merchant had stolen weapons from Desh's armory.
